name: user_info
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool tiktok_web_api.
Tool description: The fastest TikTok Web API on the planet! Get useful information like user info, video info and so on!
API description: Retrieve TikTok user information by username using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

username.description: The TikTok username of the user whose information is to be retrieved.
